name: Arch Linux Dark Projects 2013 (pdq)
css: @namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml); @-moz-document domain(projects.archlinux.org){input, textarea, select {color: #CFCFCF;background-color: #0D0D0D;border-color: !important;} body {color: #A5A5A5 !important;background-color: #0D0D0D !important;} div#cgit a {color: #1715BA !important;} div#cgit table#header td.main a {color: #CFCFCF !important;} div#cgit table#header td.sub {color: #6E6E6E !important;border-top-color: #292929 !important;} div#cgit table.tabs {border-bottom-color: #292929 !important;} div#cgit table.tabs td a {color: #6E6E6E !important;} div#cgit table.tabs td a.active {color: #CFCFCF !important;background-color: #373737 !important;} div#cgit div.path {color: #CFCFCF !important;background-color: #151515 !important;} div#cgit div.content {border-bottom-color: #292929 !important;} div#cgit table.list tr {background-color: #0D0D0D !important;} div#cgit table.list tr.logheader {background-color: #151515 !important;} div#cgit table.list tr:hover {background-color: #151515 !important;} div#cgit table.list tr.nohover:hover {background-color: #0D0D0D !important;} div#cgit table.list td.commitgraph .column1 {color: #E82F2C !important;} div#cgit table.list td.commitgraph .column2 {color: #2CE82F !important;} div#cgit table.list td.commitgraph .column3 {color: #E4E82C !important;} div#cgit table.list td.commitgraph .column4 {color: #2F2CE8 !important;} div#cgit table.list td.commitgraph .column5 {color: #E82CE4 !important;} div#cgit table.list td.commitgraph .column6 {color: #2CE4E8 !important;} div#cgit table.list td a {color: #CFCFCF !important;} div#cgit table.list td a.ls-dir {color: #1715BA !important;} div#cgit table.list td a:hover {color: #1715BA !important;} div#cgit table#downloads {border-top-color: #6E6E6E !important;border-right-color: #6E6E6E !important;border-bottom-color: #6E6E6E !important;border-left-color: #6E6E6E !important;} div#cgit table#downloads th {background-color: #373737 !important;} div#cgit div#blob {border-top-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-right-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-bottom-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-left-color: #CFCFCF !important;} div#cgit div.error {color: #BA1715 !important;} div#cgit table.blob {border-top-color: #CFCFCF !important;} div#cgit table.blob td.lines {color: #CFCFCF !important;} div#cgit table.blob td.linenumbers {border-right-color: #676767 !important;} div#cgit table.blob a.no, div#cgit table.ssdiff a.no {color: #676767 !important;} div#cgit table.blob a.no a:hover {color: #CFCFCF !important;} div#cgit table.bin-blob {border-top-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-right-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-bottom-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-left-color: #CFCFCF !important;} div#cgit table.bin-blob th {border-top-color: #6E6E6E !important;border-right-color: #6E6E6E !important;border-bottom-color: #6E6E6E !important;border-left-color: #6E6E6E !important;} div#cgit table.bin-blob td {border-left-color: #6E6E6E !important;} div#cgit div.cgit-panel table {border-top-color: #454545 !important;border-right-color: #454545 !important;border-bottom-color: #454545 !important;border-left-color: #454545 !important;background-color: #151515 !important;} div#cgit div.notes {border-top-color: #4B4C15 !important;border-right-color: #4B4C15 !important;border-bottom-color: #4B4C15 !important;border-left-color: #4B4C15 !important;background-color: #161616 !important;} div#cgit table.diffstat {border-top-color: #454545 !important;border-right-color: #454545 !important;border-bottom-color: #454545 !important;border-left-color: #454545 !important;background-color: #151515 !important;} div#cgit table.diffstat td span.modechange {color: #BA1715 !important;} div#cgit table.diffstat td.add a {color: #4AEB4D !important;} div#cgit table.diffstat td.del a {color: #BA1715 !important;} div#cgit table.diffstat td.upd a {color: #1715BA !important;} div#cgit table.diffstat td.graph td.add {background-color: #717171 !important;} div#cgit table.diffstat td.graph td.rem {background-color: #717171 !important;} div#cgit div.diffstat-summary {color: #606060 !important;} div#cgit table.diff td div.head {color: #CFCFCF !important;} div#cgit table.diff td div.hunk {color: #3B38E9 !important;} div#cgit table.diff td div.add {color: #4AEB4D !important;} div#cgit table.diff td div.del {color: #BA1715 !important;} div#cgit table.list td.reposection {color: #606060 !important;} div#cgit ul.pager a {color: #6E6E6E !important;} div#cgit span.age-mins {color: #45EA47 !important;} div#cgit span.age-hours {color: #45EA47 !important;} div#cgit span.age-days {color: #76F078 !important;} div#cgit span.age-weeks {color: #979797 !important;} div#cgit span.age-months {color: #606060 !important;} div#cgit span.age-years {color: #373737 !important;} div#cgit div.footer {color: #292929 !important;} div#cgit a.branch-deco {color: #CFCFCF !important;background-color: #3F3F3F !important;border-top-color: #51EC54 !important;border-right-color: #51EC54 !important;border-bottom-color: #51EC54 !important;border-left-color: #51EC54 !important;} div#cgit a.tag-deco {color: #CFCFCF !important;background-color: #3F3F3F !important;border-top-color: #E9EC51 !important;border-right-color: #E9EC51 !important;border-bottom-color: #E9EC51 !important;border-left-color: #E9EC51 !important;} div#cgit a.remote-deco {color: #CFCFCF !important;background-color: #1E1E1E !important;border-top-color: #5451EC !important;border-right-color: #5451EC !important;border-bottom-color: #5451EC !important;border-left-color: #5451EC !important;} div#cgit a.deco {color: #CFCFCF !important;background-color: #3F3F3F !important;border-top-color: #EC5451 !important;border-right-color: #EC5451 !important;border-bottom-color: #EC5451 !important;border-left-color: #EC5451 !important;} div#cgit table.stats {border-top-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-right-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-bottom-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-left-color: #CFCFCF !important;} div#cgit table.stats th {background-color: #151515 !important;border-top-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-right-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-bottom-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-left-color: #CFCFCF !important;} div#cgit table.stats td {border-top-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-right-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-bottom-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-left-color: #CFCFCF !important;} div#cgit table.stats td.sum {color: #DF1C19 !important;} div#cgit table.vgraph {border-top-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-right-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-bottom-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-left-color: #CFCFCF !important;} div#cgit table.vgraph th {background-color: #151515 !important;border-top-color: #D1E7FF !important;border-right-color: #D1E7FF !important;border-bottom-color: #D1E7FF !important;border-left-color: #D1E7FF !important;} div#cgit table.vgraph div.bar {background-color: #151515 !important;} div#cgit table.hgraph {border-top-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-right-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-bottom-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-left-color: #CFCFCF !important;} div#cgit table.hgraph th {background-color: #151515 !important;border-top-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-right-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-bottom-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-left-color: #CFCFCF !important;} div#cgit table.hgraph div.bar {background-color: #151515 !important;} div#cgit table.ssdiff td {border-left-color: #454545 !important;border-right-color: #454545 !important;} div#cgit table.ssdiff td.add {color: #CFCFCF !important;background-color: #1E1E1E !important;} div#cgit table.ssdiff td.add_dark {color: #CFCFCF !important;background-color: #484848 !important;} div#cgit table.ssdiff span.add {background-color: #1E1E1E !important;} div#cgit table.ssdiff td.del {color: #CFCFCF !important;background-color: #1E1E1E !important;} div#cgit table.ssdiff td.del_dark {color: #CFCFCF !important;background-color: #484848 !important;} div#cgit table.ssdiff span.del {background-color: #1E1E1E !important;} div#cgit table.ssdiff td.changed {color: #CFCFCF !important;background-color: #1E1E1E !important;} div#cgit table.ssdiff td.changed_dark {color: #CFCFCF !important;background-color: #484848 !important;} div#cgit table.ssdiff td.lineno {color: #CFCFCF !important;background-color: #151515 !important;} div#cgit table.ssdiff td.hunk {color: #CFCFCF !important;background-color: #1E1E1E !important;border-top-color: #454545 !important;border-bottom-color: #454545 !important;} div#cgit table.ssdiff td.head {border-top-color: #454545 !important;border-bottom-color: #454545 !important;} div#cgit table.ssdiff td.head div.head {color: #CFCFCF !important;} div#cgit table.ssdiff td.foot {border-top-color: #454545 !important;} div#cgit table.blob .num {color: #E7B427 !important;} div#cgit table.blob .esc {color: #BA15B7 !important;} div#cgit table.blob .str {color: #E2211E !important;} div#cgit table.blob .pps {color: #E8EB4A !important;} div#cgit table.blob .slc {color: #666566 !important;} div#cgit table.blob .com {color: #666566 !important;} div#cgit table.blob .ppc {color: #49EB4C !important;} div#cgit table.blob .opt {color: #CFCFCF !important;} div#cgit table.blob .ipl {color: #2985E7 !important;} div#cgit table.blob .lin {color: #8A8A8A !important;} div#cgit table.blob .kwa {color: #CFCFCF !important;} div#cgit table.blob .kwb {color: #2985E7 !important;} div#cgit table.blob .kwc {color: #CFCFCF !important;} div#cgit table.blob .kwd {color: #4D4AEA !important;} #archnavbar {background-color: #090909 !important;border-bottom-color: #199ADF !important;} #archnavbar ul#archnavbarlist li a {color: #535353 !important;} #archnavbar ul li a:hover {color: #D1E7FF !important;} }
